overview: Product management professional that started Ten43 Technologies Dec. 2010 to develop mobile, web and desktop applications that connect citizens to 9-1-1. • Responsible for the vision, business model, design, operating and development budgets and management of the mobile, web and Windows desktop solution. • Researched market requirements, customer pain, competitors and various pricing models to put together a business case and go to market strategy for the solution. • Introduced and manage our Agile Scrum process with development and QA. • Wrote user stories for the iOS (iPhone and iPad), server, web and desktop components of the system. Solution utilizes GPS, mapping, SMS, instant messenger, Google APIs, and Facebook components and services.
